016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.api;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonElement;
019import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonCreator;
020import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonValue;
021import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
022import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ArrayNode;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.JsonNodeFactory;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.NullNode;
025import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
026
027import java.util.Collections;
028import java.util.List;
029import java.util.Map;
030import java.util.function.Function;
031
032import static com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonCreator.Mode.DELEGATING;
033
034public record JsonDomainEvent(ObjectNode json)
035        implements JsonElement, DomainEvent {
036
037    public static Builder event(String eventName) {
038        return new JsonDomainEvent.Builder(eventName);
039    }
040
041    public record Builder(ObjectNode builder) {
042
043        public Builder(String eventName) {
044            this(JsonNodeFactory.instance.objectNode());
045            builder.set("event", builder.textNode(eventName));
046        }
047
048        public StateBuilder created(String type, String id) {
049            builder.set("created", builder.objectNode()
050                    .<ObjectNode>set("type", builder.textNode(type))
051                    .set("id", builder.textNode(id)));
052
053            return new StateBuilder(builder);
054        }
055
056        public StateBuilder created(Enum<?> type, String id) {
057            return created(type.name(), id);
058        }
059
060        public StateBuilder updated(String type, String id) {
061            builder.set("updated", builder.objectNode()
062                    .<ObjectNode>set("type", builder.textNode(type))
063                    .set("id", builder.textNode(id)));
064
065            return new StateBuilder(builder);
066        }
067
068        public StateBuilder updated(Enum<?> type, String id) {
069            return updated(type.name(), id);
070        }
071
072        public JsonDomainEvent deleted(String type, String id) {
073            builder.set("deleted", builder.objectNode()
074                    .<ObjectNode>set("type", builder.textNode(type))
075                    .set("id", builder.textNode(id)));
076
077            return new JsonDomainEvent(builder);
078        }
079
080        public JsonDomainEvent deleted(Enum<?> type, String id) {
081            return deleted(type.name(), id);
082        }
083    }
084
085    public record StateBuilder(ObjectNode builder) {
086        private static final Map<Class<?>, Function<Object, JsonNode>> TO_JSON =
087                Map.of(
088                        String.class, v -> JsonNodeFactory.instance.textNode(v.toString()),
089                        Integer.class, v -> JsonNodeFactory.instance.numberNode((Integer) v)
090                );
091
092        public StateBuilder attribute(String name, JsonNode value) {
093            JsonNode attributes = builder.get("attributes");
094            if (attributes == null) {
095                attributes = builder.objectNode();
096                builder.set("attributes", attributes);
097            }
098
099            ObjectNode objectNode = (ObjectNode) attributes;
100            objectNode.set(name, value);
101
102            return this;
103        }
104
105        public StateBuilder attribute(Enum<?> name, JsonNode value) {
106            return attribute(name.name(), value);
107        }
108
109        public StateBuilder attribute(String name, Object value) {
110            if (value == null) {
111                attribute(name, NullNode.getInstance());
112            } else {
113                attribute(name, TO_JSON
114                        .getOrDefault(value.getClass(), (v) -> JsonNodeFactory.instance.textNode(v.toString()))
115                        .apply(value));
116            }
117
118            return this;
119        }
120
121        public StateBuilder attribute(Enum<?> name, Object value) {
122            return attribute(name.name(), value);
123        }
124
125        public StateBuilder addedRelationship(String relationship, String type, String id) {
126
127            if (id == null)
128                return this;
129
130            JsonNode relationships = builder.get("addedrelationships");
131            if (relationships == null) {
132                relationships = builder.arrayNode();
133                builder.set("addedrelationships", relationships);
134            }
135
136            ArrayNode arrayNode = (ArrayNode) relationships;
137            JsonNode relationshipNode = arrayNode.objectNode()
138                    .<ObjectNode>set("type", arrayNode.textNode(type))
139                    .<ObjectNode>set("id", arrayNode.textNode(id))
140                    .set("relationship", arrayNode.textNode(relationship));
141            arrayNode.add(relationshipNode);
142
143            return this;
144        }
145
146        public StateBuilder addedRelationship(Enum<?> relationship, Enum<?> type, String id) {
147            return addedRelationship(relationship.name(), type.name(), id);
148        }
149
150        public StateBuilder removedRelationship(String relationship, String type, String id) {
151
152            JsonNode relationships = builder.get("removedrelationships");
153            if (relationships == null) {
154                relationships = builder.arrayNode();
155                builder.set("removedrelationships", relationships);
156            }
157
158            ArrayNode arrayNode = (ArrayNode) relationships;
159            JsonNode relationshipNode = arrayNode.objectNode()
160                    .<ObjectNode>set("type", arrayNode.textNode(type))
161                    .<ObjectNode>set("id", id == null ? arrayNode.nullNode() : arrayNode.textNode(id))
162                    .set("relationship", arrayNode.textNode(relationship));
163            arrayNode.add(relationshipNode);
164
165            return this;
166        }
167
168        public StateBuilder removedRelationship(Enum<?> relationship, Enum<?> type, String id) {
169            return removedRelationship(relationship.name(), type.name(), id);
170        }
171
172        public JsonDomainEvent build() {
173            return new JsonDomainEvent(builder);
174        }
175    }
176
177    @JsonCreator(mode = DELEGATING)
178    public JsonDomainEvent {
179    }
180
181    @JsonValue
182    public ObjectNode event() {
183        return json;
184    }
185
186    public String getName()
187    {
188        return json.path("event").asText();
189    }
190
191    public boolean isCreatedOrUpdated() {
192        return json.has("created") || json.has("updated");
193    }
194
195    public JsonEntity getCreated() {
196        ObjectNode created = (ObjectNode) json.get("created");
197        return created == null ? null : new JsonEntity(created);
198    }
199
200    public JsonEntity getUpdated() {
201        ObjectNode updated = (ObjectNode) json.get("updated");
202        return updated == null ? null : new JsonEntity(updated);
203    }
204
205    public JsonEntity getDeleted() {
206        ObjectNode deleted = (ObjectNode) json.get("deleted");
207        return deleted == null ? null : new JsonEntity(deleted);
208    }
209
210    public JsonEntity getEntity()
211    {
212        JsonEntity entity = getUpdated();
213        if (entity != null)
214            return entity;
215        entity = getCreated();
216        if (entity != null)
217            return entity;
218        return getDeleted();
219    }
220
221    public Map<String, JsonNode> getAttributes() {
222        ObjectNode attrs = (ObjectNode) json.get("attributes");
223        if (attrs == null)
224            return Collections.emptyMap();
225        else
226            return JsonElement.asMap(attrs);
227    }
228
229    public List<JsonRelationship> getAddedRelationships() {
230        return getListAs("addedrelationships", json -> new JsonRelationship((ObjectNode) json))
231                .orElse(Collections.emptyList());
232    }
233
234    public List<JsonRelationship> getRemovedRelationships() {
235        return getListAs("removedrelationships", json -> new JsonRelationship((ObjectNode) json))
236                .orElse(Collections.emptyList());
237    }
238
239    public record JsonEntity(ObjectNode json)
240            implements JsonElement {
241        public String getType() {
242            return getString("type").orElse(null);
243        }
244
245        public String getId() {
246            return getString("id").orElse(null);
247        }
248    }
249
250    public record JsonRelationship(ObjectNode json)
251            implements JsonElement {
252        public JsonEntity getEntity() {
253            return new JsonEntity(json);
254        }
255
256        public String getRelationship() {
257            return getString("relationship").orElseThrow();
258        }
259    }
260}
